p: Human development may benefit our way of living today, but also affect our future. All these changes, including our changing behaviour in response to these changes, may affect all kinds of living creatures, including wild animals (potential hosts for deadly pathogens) and arthropods such as ticks and mosquitoes, the most important groups of vectors of pathogens from a medico-veterinary perspective ( Dantas-Torres etÂ al., 2012, Caraballo and King, 2014).
